attributes.action: protect Jedi throughout Britain by incorporating them in the Religious and Racial Hatred Bill as well as teaching about their beliefs in Religious Education classes in schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: According to the 2001 census, Jediism is the fourth largest religion in Britain, with over 390,000 people across the UK answering 'Jedi' or 'Jedi Knight' on the religion question. A Church of Jediism currently exists in Holyhead, and another two are planned to open - in London and Bristol, this year. Jedi have a set of beliefs, however unfortunately have to live with discrimination and bullying because of their beliefs.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
